name: Mario Kart DX12
description:
This was a project to create and engine to power a Mario Kart styled game with DirectX12. I worked with a team of four to build the "ThICC Engine" which we then created this Mario Kart game with. The end result features a number of maps, a number of characters and karts, and a cup/race mode (cup mode cycles through all maps in a cup, and race allows a single map to be played).

Supports 1-4 players.

To read more about the engine project, check out the repo (with all source code) on GitHub!
